text: Unareke ba bandi bagize idini ryabo umukino n’ikidafite umumaro, bakanashukwa n’ubuzima bw’isi. Kandi ubibutse uyifashishije (Qur’an) kugira ngo hatazagira roho (muri roho zabo) yorekwa kubera ibyo yakoze. Nta wundi murinzi utari Allah cyangwa uwayivuganira. N’ubwo yatanga incungu iyo ari yo yose ntiyakwakirwa. Abo ni bo boretswe kubera ibyo bakoze. Bazahabwa ikinyobwa (cy’amazi) yatuye n’ibihano bibabaza kubera ibyo bahakanaga
